body:
These two lines are very repetitive in this test class. Can't we add a method like in supervisor_test?

def _test_dir(self, test_name):
  test_dir = os.path.join(self.get_temp_dir(), test_name)
  gfile.MakeDirs(test_dir)
  return test_dir

def _test_dir(self, test_name):
test_dir = os.path.join(self.get_temp_dir(), test_name)
gfile.MakeDirs(test_dir)
return test_dir
